protein.specific_function: Displays phosphatase activity toward several substrates. The highest relative activity is toward ERK1.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Ishibashi T, Bottaro DP, Michieli P, Kelley CA, Aaronson SA: A novel dual specificity phosphatase induced by serum stimulation and heat shock. J Biol Chem. 1994 Nov 25;269(47):29897-902.
Kwak SP, Dixon JE: Multiple dual specificity protein tyrosine phosphatases are expressed and regulated differentially in liver cell lines. J Biol Chem. 1995 Jan 20;270(3):1156-60.
